email_body:
Dear Lars Treble,

We hope this email finds you well. As a valued member of the SafeSecurity team and an influential figure in guiding our organization towards continued success, we wanted to bring to your attention an important update that requires your urgent action.

SafeSecurity has recently implemented a critical security measure to protect our systems from potential cyber threats. In order to ensure that your account remains secure, we kindly request you to click here to update your login credentials.

Your proactive response is vital in maintaining the integrity of our network infrastructure and safeguarding our valuable data.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to our IT department.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,

John Anderson

SafeSecurity Team
